sentence.Network_en: An ambulance service was organized and I joined in as a stretcher bearer.
sentence.Network_cn: 组织了一个救护队,我成了该队的一名担架队员.

sentence.Network_en: Stewart was trying to clear a path for the stretcher.
sentence.Network_cn: 斯图尔特在努力给担架开路。

sentence.Network_en: I hate to be the bearer of bad news.
sentence.Network_cn: 我讨厌告诉别人坏消息。
